thread.section_title: The Chesterfield Mayfair - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, great staff.
thread.title_full: Great hotel, great staff. - Review of The Chesterfield Mayfair, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Liverpoolgirl91
title: Great hotel, great staff.
text:
Just spent six days at the Chesterfield hotel. What a treat. The staff are wonderful, so pleasant and friendly without being intrusive. The bar is cozy and the service was the best. The room is a little on the small side but the amenities are good.
I think what makes this hotel so enjoyable are the staff. The buffet breakfast is plentiful and the menu items offer a good variety. All things considered a great stay and a very convenient location very close to Green Park underground.
This is my third visit, would continue coming back.
